name: Lets Play Basketball 3D
description:
Lets Play Basketball 3D is a challenging game for real basketball lovers. If you are good in throwing basketball and addictive of scoring 2 basket points then do must download this game. Lets Play Basketball 3D is constituent of perfectly tuned physics of throwing basketball with great graphics & game play based on user skills..
Lets Play Basketball 3D is a complete game it will surely make you addictive because of its huge amount of challenges.
Game Features:
Great Graphics great controls great levels and highly addictive game.
Lets Play Basketball 3D consist of great game features.Including 6 modes with different scoring challenges and the modes are :
1 Club
2 Studio
3 Dance Floor
4 Fantasy World
5 Halloween
6 Christmas
Tackle the challenge to unlock the next level.

Each mode contain ten different time challenges and user need to compete with its score to unlock the next level.
1st Challenge is of 45 baskets in required time.
2nd Challenge is of to do 80 baskets in limited time.
3rd Challenge is of to do 125 baskets.
4th Challenge is of to do 170 baskets.
5th Challenge is of to do 220 baskets.
6th Challenge is of to do 250 baskets.
7th Challenge is of to do 300 baskets.
8th Challenge is of 340 baskets.
9th Challenge is of 370 baskets
10th Challenge is of 400 baskets
11th Challenge is of 440 baskets.
How To Play:
Swipe on screen. The swipe will cover an area that will apply a maximum force on ball.
Carefully watch the movement of basket to score the maximum points to unlock the next level.
Play and let your friends and family play this game and challenge your friend with your highest score.
